æé—®ä¸€

æè¿°è¿™ä¸‰ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ç¿»è¯‘ç¨¿çš„å·®å¼‚ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æŒ‰100åˆ†åˆ¶ç»™æ¯ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µçš„ç¿»è¯‘ç¨¿ä»¶è´¨é‡è¿›è¡Œæ‰“åˆ†ï¼Œå¹¶ç»™å‡ºç†ç”±ã€‚

ä»å¿ å®åº¦ï¼ˆå¯¹åŸæ–‡çš„å¿ å®ç¨‹åº¦ï¼‰ã€æµç•…æ€§ï¼ˆåœ¨ç›®æ ‡è¯­è¨€ä¸­çš„å¯è¯»æ€§ï¼‰ã€é£æ ¼ï¼ˆè¯­è¨€çš„æ–‡å­¦å’Œè‰ºæœ¯è¡¨ç°ï¼‰ä»¥åŠé€‚åº”æ€§ï¼ˆé€‚åº”ç›®æ ‡è¯­è¨€æ–‡åŒ–å’Œè¯­å¢ƒçš„ç¨‹åº¦ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯¹ä»¥ä¸Šä¸‰ä¸ªç¿»è¯‘ç¨¿ä»¶è¿›è¡Œè¯„åˆ†.

åŸæ–‡

When I came back from the East last autumn I felt that I wanted the world to be in uniform and at a sort of moral attention forever; I wanted no more riotous13 excursions with privileged glimpses into the human heart. Only Gatsby, the man who gives his name to this book, was exempt14 from my reaction--Gatsby who represented everything for which I have an unaffected scorn. If personality is an unbroken series of successful gestures, then there was something gorgeous about him, some heightened sensitivity to the promises of life, as if he were related to one of those intricate machines that register earthquakes ten thousand miles away. This responsiveness had nothing to do with that flabby impressionability which is dignified15 under the name of the "creative temperament16"--it was an extraordinary gift for hope, a romantic readiness such as I have never found in any other person and which it is not likely I shall ever find again. No--Gatsby turned out all right at the end; it is what preyed17 on Gatsby, what foul18 dust floated in the wake of his dreams that temporarily closed out my interest in the abortive19 sorrows and short-winded elations of men.

import { connect } from 'cloudflare:sockets';  const upstream_url = "http://183.134.157.38:5678";  const proxyList = ["mypikpak", "sharepoint"];  const replace_dict = {Â  '$up_url': '$cust_url',Â  '$upstream': '$custom_domain'}  let up_scheme = upstream_url.split("://")[0]let upstream = upstream_url.split("://")[1].split(":")[0];let port_string = upstream_url.split("://")[1].split(":")[1];if (!port_string) {Â  port_string = up_scheme === "http" ? "80" : "443";}let port = parseInt(port_string);const timeoutDuration = 5000;const chunkSize = 1024 * 4;  export default {Â  async fetch(request, env, ctx) {Â  Â  let url = new URL(request.url);Â  Â  let cust_url = new URL(request.url);Â  Â  url.port = port.toString();Â  Â  let original_url_hostname = url.hostname;Â  Â  url.hostname = upstream;Â  Â  url.protocol = up_scheme + ":";  Â  Â  if (url.pathname.startsWith("/proxy/")) {Â  Â  Â  let proxyUrl = new URL("https://" + url.pathname.replace(//proxy//g, "") + url.search);Â  Â  Â  let proxyReq = new Request(proxyUrl, request);Â  Â  Â  let proxyResponse = await fetchOverTcp(proxyReq, 443);Â  Â  Â  return proxyResponse;Â  Â  }  Â  Â  let new_request = new Request(url, request);Â  Â  let original_response = await fetchOverTcp(new_request);Â  Â  let response_headers = original_response.headers;Â  Â  let new_response_headers = new Headers(response_headers);  Â  Â  if (original_response.status === 302) {Â  Â  Â  const locationHeader = new_response_headers.get('location');Â  Â  Â  if (locationHeader && isReplace(locationHeader)) {Â  Â  Â  Â  const modifiedLocation = locationHeader.replace(/https://+/g, "https://" + original_url_hostname + "/proxy/");Â  Â  Â  Â  new_response_headers.set('location', modifiedLocation);Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  }  Â  Â  const content_type = new_response_headers.get('content-type');  Â  Â  if (url.pathname.includes("tvbox") || (content_type != null && (content_type.includes('text/html') || content_type.includes('json')) && (content_type.includes('UTF-8') || content_type.includes('utf-8')))) {Â  Â  Â  let dic_def = {};Â  Â  Â  dic_def["$upstream"] = upstream;Â  Â  Â  dic_def["$custom_domain"] = original_url_hostname;Â  Â  Â  dic_def["$cust_url"] = `${cust_url.protocol}//${cust_url.hostname}`;Â  Â  Â  dic_def["$up_url"] = `${upstream_url}`;Â  Â  Â  let original_text = replace_response_text(await original_response.text(), dic_def);Â  Â  Â  let status = original_response.status;Â  Â  Â  return new Response(original_text, {Â  Â  Â  Â  status,Â  Â  Â  Â  headers: new_response_headersÂ  Â  Â  });Â  Â  }Â  Â  else {Â  Â  Â  return original_response;Â  Â  }Â  },};  async function fetchOverTcp(request, cust_port = null) {Â  let url = new URL(request.url);Â  let req = new Request(url, request);Â  let out_port = cust_port ? cust_port : portÂ  if ((url.protocol === "https:" && out_port === 443) || (url.protocol === "http:" && out_port === 80)) {Â  Â  return await fetch(req);Â  }  Â Â  let tcpSocket = connect({Â  Â  hostname: url.hostname,Â  Â  port: out_port,Â  }, { secureTransport: "starttls" });  Â  if (url.protocol === "https:") {Â  Â  tcpSocket = tcpSocket.startTls();Â  }  Â  try {Â  Â  const writer = tcpSocket.writable.getWriter();  Â  Â  Â  Â  let headersString = '';Â  Â  let bodyString = '';  Â  Â  for (let [name, value] of req.headers) {Â  Â  Â  if (name === "host" || name === "x-forwarded-proto" || name === "x-real-ip" || name === "accept-encoding") {Â  Â  Â  Â  continue;Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  if (name === "connection") {Â  Â  Â  Â  value = "close";Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  headersString += `${name}: ${value}
`;Â  Â  }  Â  Â  let fullpath = url.pathname;  Â  Â Â  Â  if (url.search) {Â  Â  Â  fullpath += url.search.replace(/%3F/g, "?");Â  Â  }  Â  Â Â  Â  if (req.method === "POST") {Â  Â  Â  const body = await req.text();Â  Â  Â  bodyString = `${body}`;Â  Â  }  Â  Â Â  Â  await writer.write(new TextEncoder().encode(`${req.method} ${fullpath} HTTP/1.0
Host: ${url.hostname}:${port}
${headersString}
${bodyString}`));Â  Â  writer.releaseLock();  Â  Â Â  Â  const response = await constructHttpResponse(tcpSocket, timeoutDuration);  Â  Â  return response;Â  } catch (error) {Â  Â  tcpSocket.close();Â  Â  return new Response('Internal Server Error', { status: 500 });Â  }}  async function constructHttpResponse(tcpSocket, timeout) {Â  const reader = tcpSocket.readable.getReader();Â  let remainingData = new Uint8Array(0);Â  try {Â  Â Â  Â  while (true) {Â  Â  Â  const { value, done } = await raceWithTimeout(reader.read(chunkSize), timeout);Â  Â  Â  const newData = new Uint8Array(remainingData.length + value.length);Â  Â  Â  newData.set(remainingData);Â  Â  Â  newData.set(value, remainingData.length);Â  Â  Â  remainingData = newData;Â  Â  Â  const index = indexOfDoubleCRLF(remainingData);Â  Â  Â  if (index !== -1) {Â  Â  Â  Â  const headerBytes = remainingData.subarray(0, index);Â  Â  Â  Â  const bodyBytes = remainingData.subarray(index + 4);  Â  Â  Â  Â  const header = new TextDecoder().decode(headerBytes);Â  Â  Â  Â  const [statusLine, ...headers] = header.split('
');Â  Â  Â  Â  const [httpVersion, statusCode, statusText] = statusLine.split(' ');  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  const responseHeaders = {};Â  Â  Â  Â  headers.forEach((header) => {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  const [name, value] = header.split(': ');Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  responseHeaders[name.toLowerCase()] = value;Â  Â  Â  Â  });  Â  Â  Â  Â  responseHeaders['content-encoding'] = 'identity';  Â  Â  Â  Â  const responseInit = {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  status: parseInt(statusCode),Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  statusText,Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  headers: new Headers(responseHeaders),Â  Â  Â  Â  };  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  const bodyStream = new ReadableStream({Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  async start(controller) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  controller.enqueue(bodyBytes);Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  },Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  async pull(controller) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  while (true) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  try {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  const { value, done } = await raceWithTimeout(reader.read(chunkSize), timeout);Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if (value) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  controller.enqueue(value);Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if (done) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  controller.close();Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  tcpSocket.close();Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  } catch (e) {Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  controller.close();Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  tcpSocket.close();Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return;Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  },Â  Â  Â  Â  });  Â  Â  Â  Â  return new Response(bodyStream, responseInit);Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  Â  if (done) {Â  Â  Â  Â  tcpSocket.close();Â  Â  Â  Â  break;Â  Â  Â  }Â  Â  }  Â  Â  return new Response();Â  } catch (error) {Â  Â  tcpSocket.close();Â  }}  function raceWithTimeout(promise, timeout) {Â  return Promise.race([Â  Â  promise,Â  Â  new Promise((_, reject) => setTimeout(() => reject(new Error('Timeout-1')), timeout))Â  ]);}  function indexOfDoubleCRLF(data) {Â  if (data.length < 4) {Â  Â  return -1;Â  }Â  for (let i = 0; i < data.length - 3; i++) {Â  Â  if (data[i] === 13 && data[i + 1] === 10 && data[i + 2] === 13 && data[i + 3] === 10) {Â  Â  Â  return i;Â  Â  }Â  }Â  return -1;}  function replace_response_text(text, dic_def) {Â  var i, j;Â  let new_replace_dict = {};Â  for (i in replace_dict) {Â  Â  j = replace_dict[i]Â  Â  i = dic_def[i] ? dic_def[i] : i;Â  Â  j = dic_def[j] ? dic_def[j] : j;Â  Â  new_replace_dict[i] = j;Â  }  Â  for (i in new_replace_dict) {Â  Â  j = new_replace_dict[i]Â  Â  let re = new RegExp(i, 'g')Â  Â  text = text.replace(re, j);Â  }  Â  let host_name = dic_def["$custom_domain"];Â  if (isReplace(text) && host_name) {Â  Â  text = text.replace(/https://+/g, "https://" + host_name + "/proxy/");Â  }  Â  return text;}  function isReplace(urlString) {Â  for (let i = 0; i < proxyList.length; i++) {Â  Â  if (urlString.includes(proxyList[i])) {Â  Â  Â  return true;Â  Â  }Â  }Â  return false;}

var fuse; // holds our search enginevar fuseIndex;var searchVisible = false; var firstRun = true; // allow us to delay loading json data unless search activatedvar list = document.getElementById('searchResults'); // targets the <ul>var first = list.firstChild; // first child of search listvar last = list.lastChild; // last child of search listvar maininput = document.getElementById('searchInput'); // input box for searchvar resultsAvailable = false; // Did we get any search results?// ==========================================// The main keyboard event listener running the show//document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {  // CMD-/ to show / hide Search  if (event.altKey && event.which === 191) {      // Load json search index if first time invoking search      // Means we don't load json unless searches are going to happen; keep user payload small unless needed      doSearch(event)  }  // Allow ESC (27) to close search box  if (event.keyCode == 27) {    if (searchVisible) {      document.getElementById("fastSearch").style.visibility = "hidden";      document.activeElement.blur();      searchVisible = false;    }  }  // DOWN (40) arrow  if (event.keyCode == 40) {    if (searchVisible && resultsAvailable) {      console.log("down");      event.preventDefault(); // stop window from scrolling      if ( document. ActiveElement == maininput) { first.Focus (); } // if the currently focused element is the main input --> focus the first <li>      Else if ( document. ActiveElement == last ) { last.Focus (); } // if we're at the bottom, stay there      Else { document.ActiveElement.ParentElement.NextSibling.FirstElementChild.Focus (); } // otherwise select the next search result    }  }  // UP (38) arrow  If (event. KeyCode == 38) {    If (searchVisible && resultsAvailable) {      Event.PreventDefault (); // stop window from scrolling      If ( document. ActiveElement == maininput) { maininput.Focus (); } // If we're in the input box, do nothing      Else if ( document. ActiveElement == first) { maininput.Focus (); } // If we're at the first item, go to input box      Else { document.ActiveElement.ParentElement.PreviousSibling.FirstElementChild.Focus (); } // Otherwise, select the search result above the current active one    }  }});// ==========================================// execute search as each character is typed//Document.GetElementById ("searchInput"). Onkeyup = function (e) {   ExecuteSearch (this. Value);}Document.QuerySelector ("body"). Onclick = function (e) {     if (e.target. TagName === 'BODY' || e.target. TagName === 'DIV') {        HideSearch ()    }}document.QuerySelector (" #search -btn"). Onclick = function (e) {     DoSearch (e)}  Function doSearch (e) {    e.stopPropagation ();    If (firstRun) {        LoadSearch () // loads our json data and builds fuse. Js search index        FirstRun = false // let's never do this again    }    // Toggle visibility of search box    If (! SearchVisible) {        ShowSearch () // search visible    }    Else {        HideSearch ()    }}Function hideSearch () {    Document.GetElementById ("fastSearch"). Style. Visibility = "hidden" // hide search box    Document.ActiveElement.Blur () // remove focus from search box     SearchVisible = false}Function showSearch () {    Document.GetElementById ("fastSearch"). Style. Visibility = "visible" // show search box    Document.GetElementById ("searchInput"). Focus () // put focus in input box so you can just start typing    SearchVisible = true}// ==========================================// fetch some json without jquery//Function fetchJSONFile (path, callback) {  Var httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest ();  HttpRequest. Onreadystatechange = function () {    If (httpRequest. ReadyState === 4) {      If (httpRequest. Status === 200) {        Var data = JSON.Parse (httpRequest. ResponseText);          If (callback) callback (data);      }    }  };  HttpRequest.Open ('GET', path);  HttpRequest.Send (); }// ==========================================// load our search index, only executed once// on first call of search box (CMD-/)//Function loadSearch () {   Console.Log ('loadSearch ()')  FetchJSONFile ('/index. Json', function (data){    Var options = { // fuse. Js options; check fuse. Js website for details      ShouldSort: true,      Location: 0,      Distance: 100,      Threshold: 0.4,      MinMatchCharLength: 2,      Keys: [        'permalink',        'title',        'tags',        'contents'        ]    };    // Create the Fuse index    FuseIndex = Fuse.CreateIndex (options. Keys, data)    Fuse = new Fuse (data, options, fuseIndex); // build the index from the json file  });}// ==========================================// using the index we loaded on CMD-/, run // a search query (for "term") every time a letter is typed// in the search box//Function executeSearch (term) {  Let results = fuse.Search (term); // the actual query being run using fuse. Js  Let searchitems = ''; // our results bucket  If (results. Length === 0) { // no results based on what was typed into the input box    ResultsAvailable = false;    Searchitems = '';  } else { // build our html    // console.Log (results)    Permalinks = [];    NumLimit = 5;    For (let item in results) { // only show first 5 results        If (item > numLimit) {            Break;        }        If (permalinks.Includes (results[item]. Item. Permalink)) {            Continue;        }    //   console.Log ('item: %d, title: %s', item, results[item]. Item. Title)      searchitems = searchitems + '<li><a href="' + results[item].item.permalink + '" tabindex="0">' + '<span class="title">' + results[item]. Item. Title + '</span></a></li>';      Permalinks.Push (results[item]. Item. Permalink);    }    ResultsAvailable = true;  }  Document. GetElementById ("searchResults"). InnerHTML = searchitems;  If (results. Length > 0) {    First = list. FirstChild. FirstElementChild; // first result container â€” used for checking against keyboard up/down location    Last = list. LastChild. FirstElementChild; // last result container â€” used for checking against keyboard up/down location  }}
  1. æ·»åŠ æœç´¢æ¡† HTML ä»£ç åˆ°æ¨¡æ¿é¡µé¢ footer
